mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUM(ordercost) ordercost,DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y') orderdate FROM orders WHERE orderType=#{orderType} and orderdate>=#{begin} and orderdate<=#{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y')) temp ORDER BY orderdate ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUM(ordercost) ordercost,DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y-%m') orderdate FROM orders WHERE orderType=#{orderType} and orderdate>=#{begin} and orderdate<=#{end} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y-%m')) temp ORDER BY orderdate ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUM(ordercost) ordercost,DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y-%m-%d') orderdate FROM orders WHERE orderType=#{orderType} and orderdate>=STR_TO_DATE(#{begin},'%Y-%m-%d') and orderdate<=STR_TO_DATE(#{end},'%Y-%m-%d') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(orderdate, '%Y-%m-%d')) temp ORDER BY orderdate ASC
